items.text: Now these are the generations of the sons of Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth: and unto them were sons born after the flood.
items.plainText: Now these are the generations of the sons of Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth: and unto them were sons born after the flood.

items.text: The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.
items.plainText: The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.

items.text: And the sons of Gomer; Ashkenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.
items.plainText: And the sons of Gomer; Ashkenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.

items.text: And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.
items.plainText: And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.

items.text: By these were the isles of the Gentiles divided in their lands; every one after his tongue, after their families, in their nations.
items.plainText: By these were the isles of the Gentiles divided in their lands; every one after his tongue, after their families, in their nations.

items.text: And the sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, and Phut, and Canaan.
items.plainText: And the sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, and Phut, and Canaan.

items.text: And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabtah, and Raamah, and Sabtecha: and the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.
items.plainText: And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabtah, and Raamah, and Sabtecha: and the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.

items.text: And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be a mighty one in the earth.
items.plainText: And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be a mighty one in the earth.

items.text: He was a mighty hunter before the LORD: wherefore it is said, Even as Nimrod the mighty hunter before the LORD.
items.plainText: He was a mighty hunter before the LORD: wherefore it is said, Even as Nimrod the mighty hunter before the LORD.

items.text: And the beginning of his kingdom was Babel, and Erech, and Accad, and Calneh, in the land of Shinar.
items.plainText: And the beginning of his kingdom was Babel, and Erech, and Accad, and Calneh, in the land of Shinar.

items.text: Out of that land went forth Asshur, and builded Nineveh, and the city Rehoboth, and Calah,
items.plainText: Out of that land went forth Asshur, and builded Nineveh, and the city Rehoboth, and Calah,

items.text: And Resen between Nineveh and Calah: the same is a great city.
items.plainText: And Resen between Nineveh and Calah: the same is a great city.

items.text: And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,
items.plainText: And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,

items.text: And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (out of whom came Philistim,) and Caphtorim.
items.plainText: And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (out of whom came Philistim,) and Caphtorim.

items.text: And Canaan begat Sidon his firstborn, and Heth,
items.plainText: And Canaan begat Sidon his firstborn, and Heth,

items.text: And the Jebusite, and the Amorite, and the Girgasite,
items.plainText: And the Jebusite, and the Amorite, and the Girgasite,

items.text: And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,
items.plainText: And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,

items.text: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite: and afterward were the families of the Canaanites spread abroad.
items.plainText: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite: and afterward were the families of the Canaanites spread abroad.

items.text: And the border of the Canaanites was from Sidon, as thou comest to Gerar, unto Gaza; as thou goest, unto Sodom, and Gomorrah, and Admah, and Zeboim, even unto Lasha.
items.plainText: And the border of the Canaanites was from Sidon, as thou comest to Gerar, unto Gaza; as thou goest, unto Sodom, and Gomorrah, and Admah, and Zeboim, even unto Lasha.

items.text: These are the sons of Ham, after their families, after their tongues, in their countries, and in their nations.
items.plainText: These are the sons of Ham, after their families, after their tongues, in their countries, and in their nations.

items.text: Unto Shem also, the father of all the children of Eber, the brother of Japheth the elder, even to him were children born.
items.plainText: Unto Shem also, the father of all the children of Eber, the brother of Japheth the elder, even to him were children born.

items.text: The children of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram.
items.plainText: The children of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram.

items.text: And the children of Aram; Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Mash.
items.plainText: And the children of Aram; Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Mash.

items.text: And Arphaxad begat Salah; and Salah begat Eber.
items.plainText: And Arphaxad begat Salah; and Salah begat Eber.

items.text: And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of one was Peleg; for in his days was the earth divided; and his brother's name was Joktan.
items.plainText: And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of one was Peleg; for in his days was the earth divided; and his brother's name was Joktan.

items.text: And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,
items.plainText: And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,

items.text: And Hadoram, and Uzal, and Diklah,
items.plainText: And Hadoram, and Uzal, and Diklah,

items.text: And Obal, and Abimael, and Sheba,
items.plainText: And Obal, and Abimael, and Sheba,

items.text: And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab: all these were the sons of Joktan.
items.plainText: And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab: all these were the sons of Joktan.

items.text: And their dwelling was from Mesha, as thou goest unto Sephar a mount of the east.
items.plainText: And their dwelling was from Mesha, as thou goest unto Sephar a mount of the east.

items.text: These are the sons of Shem, after their families, after their tongues, in their lands, after their nations.
items.plainText: These are the sons of Shem, after their families, after their tongues, in their lands, after their nations.

items.text: These are the families of the sons of Noah, after their generations, in their nations: and by these were the nations divided in the earth after the flood.
items.plainText: These are the families of the sons of Noah, after their generations, in their nations: and by these were the nations divided in the earth after the flood.
